entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,972Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two endings depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 774,123Chapters: 99/?Kudos: 813

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you‚Äôre pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I‚Äôve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: race to the bottom

Author: dreamtiming

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,875Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: ‚ÄúTim said he would keep me company until you got here,‚Äù you explain in that hushed, practiced tone you‚Äôve perfected to a tee. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been keeping everything running as normal.‚Äù It‚Äôs not you he calls into question, but Bruce isn‚Äôt going to verbalize this as he takes a sip and locks eyes upon Tim, who is still locking eyes upon you. Subtle. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre always welcome,‚Äù Bruce says, keeping his tone pleasant as Tim finally deigns him with a smile, ‚ÄúBut it is a welcome surprise.‚Äù ‚ÄúWell, wouldn‚Äôt want your assistant to get lonely while they wait for you to turn up.‚Äù Tim says, and it‚Äôs delivered lightly enough that a passerby would think it a wholesome joke. You even offer a genial, polite laugh as you return back to your desk to swipe something for Bruce. Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,619Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 50

Summary: After a mission helping Constantine goes awry, you and Jason now have to navigate him being bitten by a werewolf (yes) and all the small, or large, adjustments that come with that. While Constantine works to find a reversal ‚Äî after all, he got you all into this mess and portal-hopping-lycanthropes weren‚Äôt in the mission briefing ‚Äî the two of you try to just take it all business as usual. Course that‚Äôs pretty difficult when there‚Äôs a whole family of bats getting in the way, Jason starts getting growly, and you‚Äôre fairly certain that this is all some weird fever dream. What could go wrong?

entry.title: Gotham Nights: Shadow and Red
entry.summary:
Author: lilmarshiefics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,223Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 0

Summary: In the shadowed alleys and towering skyscrapers of Gotham City, a new protector emerges to stand alongside the infamous Red Hood. F/N L/N, known as Nightshade, is a 27-year-old vigilante wielding enhanced agility, gravity manipulation, and energy shields. Haunted by a personal tragedy, Nightshade dedicates their life to shielding Gotham's innocents from the encroaching darkness. Teaming up with Jason Todd, the Red Hood, Nightshade navigates the treacherous criminal underbelly of Gotham. As they confront petty thieves and escalating threats, a surge of energy at the Gotham Docks signals a sinister plot brewing beneath the surface. Together, they face armed thugs and uncover a conspiracy that threatens to plunge the city into chaos. As Nightshade and the Red Hood delve deeper into the shadows, they realize they are caught in the crossfire of a larger game. Their partnership is tested as they confront not only external enemies but also their own inner demons. In a city teetering on the brink, Nightshade and the Red Hood must rise above the darkness to save Gotham from descending into utter chaos.

  • Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Red Hood/Reader
  • Jason Todd/Reader
  • Jason Todd
  • Reader

entry.title: A Guide to Bonds : Care, Commitment, Love, and Sex
